definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
everything is fine (idiom); all is well with the world
to close down a business for good and put the best face on it (idiom)
great luck, great profit (idiom); everything is thriving
everything is finished (idiom); And there you are!

sentences.english: I hope you HAs a maximum glad or prosperous New Year.
sentences.chinese: 謹祝新年愉快開心，大吉大利。

sentences.english: I want to send you an old man, I wish you peace in the family the most favorable auspices.
sentences.chinese: 我要送你一個老人，祝你家庭和睦大吉大利。

sentences.english: In recent months, more than two dozen sub-prime lenders have closed their doors.
sentences.chinese: 近來數月，二十四家以上的低收入貸款公司關門大吉。

sentences.english: Change your life, get the fear out of here.
sentences.chinese: 改變你的生活，讓恐懼溜之大吉。

sentences.english: They scarpered when the police got involved.
sentences.chinese: 當警方介入時，他們便溜之大吉。

sentences.english: Two other plants in the town have also closed.
sentences.chinese: 而鎮上的另外兩個工廠也同時關門大吉。

sentences.english: Yulan's father, Zhu Daji, agrees to sell his ancestral house to the government.
sentences.chinese: 玉蘭的父親朱大吉見錢眼開，竟將祖屋授權給政府。

sentences.english: Just get a cool tool and we're set".
sentences.chinese: 只要找到一個酷酷的工具就萬事大吉了”。

sentences.english: When the police arrived, the burglars took a powder over the back wall.
sentences.chinese: 警察趕到時，夜賊早已翻後牆溜之大吉了。

sentences.english: If you see the clock, all is well.
sentences.chinese: 如果看到時鐘，則萬事大吉了。

sentences.english: Good luck to you and your family.
They always seem to slip away right when you need them most.
sentences.chinese: 它們似乎經常在你最需要它們的時候溜之大吉。

sentences.english: The fishing season began most auspiciously.
When a healthy rat smells a cat, it flees.
sentences.chinese: 當一隻健康的老鼠聞到貓的味道時，立馬溜之大吉。

sentences.english: It's a good time for you to slip away.
sentences.chinese: 這正是你溜之大吉的好時機。

sentences.english: A precious Darjeeling blended with the flavour of fresh bergamot (lemon), strong and intensive.
sentences.chinese: 混合了大吉嶺芳香型紅茶，帶佛手柑風味。

definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
great luck, great profit (idiom); everything is thriving
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
to arrive home/facing one's home/home-coming/(soccer) facing the goalmouth
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
fateful accident/inauspicious matter (involving death or casualties)
